name: updateNetworkWirelessAlternateManagementInterface
description: Update alternate management interface and device static IP

accessPoints.description: Array of access point serial number and IP assignment. Note: accessPoints IP assignment is not applicable for template networks, in other words, do not put 'accessPoints' in the body when updating template networks. Also, an empty 'accessPoints' array will remove all previous static IP assignments

alternateManagementIp.description: Wireless alternate management interface device IP. Provide an empty string to remove alternate management IP assignment

dns1.description: Primary DNS must be in IP format

dns2.description: Optional secondary DNS must be in IP format

gateway.description: Gateway must be in IP format

serial.description: Serial number of access point to be configured with alternate management IP

subnetMask.description: Subnet mask must be in IP format

enabled.description: Boolean value to enable or disable alternate management interface

protocols.description: Can be one or more of the following values: 'radius', 'snmp', 'syslog' or 'ldap'

vlanId.description: Alternate management interface VLAN, must be between 1 and 4094
